original_title: Oblatos, el vuelo que surc칩 la noche
overview: Waymas works in a subway repair worshop in Mexico City, while Tony sells chicken in a marketplace in Guadalajara. Both were part of the September 23rd Communist League, the larger urban guerrilla group in Mexico during the 1970s. On January the 22nd of 1976, both escaped prison through an elaborated military plan. They recount how they escaped and why  they were fighting for then and now.
title: Oblatos, Epic Flight into the Night
